description: A large, furry creature with multiple eyes and tusks is shown driving a car at night, wearing a hat. A human arm adorned with a pearl bracelet reaches out from the passenger side. This surreal scene creates absurdity by placing a monstrous being in the mundane context of driving with a human companion. The creature's somewhat human-like attire contrasts sharply with its non-human features. The image presents an unexpected and bizarre interaction, perhaps a date or encounter, challenging typical expectations.
caption: And so, after a lovely meal, Bob asked if he could at least have the arm.
